data.message: Geometric composition learning and Sonora redesign: Successfully researched geometric design principles, extracted micro-patterns (golden ratio sizing, 40% overlap rule, diagonal cascade), stored formulas in Duro, and applied them to redesign Sonora landing page. Circles now read as unified cluster instead of separate objects. User confirmed improvement.
data.task: Geometric composition learning and Sonora redesign
data.outcome: Successfully researched geometric design principles, extracted micro-patterns (golden ratio sizing, 40% overlap rule, diagonal cascade), stored formulas in Duro, and applied them to redesign Sonora landing page. Circles now read as unified cluster instead of separate objects. User confirmed improvement.
